sentences.en: " Oh , gosh, nothing like you do.
sentences.cn: “ 咳, 我跟你做的可不一样.

sentences.en: Gosh, that was a heavy bag!
Gosh, there's a lot of noise.
Gosh! A pair of excellent football boots.
sentences.cn: 哎呀! 是一双上好的足球靴.
我的天! 在杂志下面.

sentences.en: Gosh! My muscles is going to ache all over tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 哎呀! 明天我全身肌肉都会痛了.

sentences.en: I have been to, oh, gosh, I can't even remember. Austria.
sentences.cn: 我曾去过, 噢, 天哪, 我几乎都想不起来了. 奥地利.

sentences.en: I said I'd do it and, by gosh, I did!
sentences.cn: 我说过我要做那件事, 上天作证, 我还真做了!
我的天, 雨真大 啊 !

sentences.en: Oh my gosh! No. I can't believe it!
sentences.cn: 我的天啊! 不,我不相信.

sentences.en: Oh, Gosh ! But Harry thought they were gone.
sentences.cn: 噢, 天哦.哈里想着它们已经丢了.

sentences.en: Oh, Gosh! What awful weather they're having!
sentences.cn: 噢, 我的天! 他们这是什么鬼天气 呀 !
